1131222.content:
Mike's face twists into a mask of rage as he lunges forward and grabs you in his fist. You cry out in pain as he squeezes savagely.

"Listen to me, you little shit! You're my slave now, and when I tell you to do something, you DO it. I can crush you anytime I like, and now I'm going to have to punish you for disobeying me."

You cringe in fear at the sound of the word "punish." You have no idea what your former friend is about to do to you at this size, but it can't be anything good. You'd really not like to to find out anyway, but it looks like you have no choice now...

Just then, a woman's voice calls pleasantly up from downstairs. "Mike! hurry up, we're leaving now!" Mike stops abruptly at hearing his mother's voice calling, and his grip momentarily relaxes. All too quickly again he looks back at you in his hand and the pressure increases once more.

"My parents and I are going out for breakfast, so I'm gonna have to put you someplace safe. We'll deal with your punishment later." You sigh in relief, although the evil grin on Mike's face underlines the very temporary nature of your relief. "Let's see now..." Mike looks around the room. "Ah, perfect." You cringe once more as you see where you're headed. "You won't be able to get out of here." Mike says as he tosses you into one of the drawers of his dresser - the sock drawer. You are overpowered by the smell, as at least half the socks in his drawer have been worn and carelessly thrown back in. Mike sees you gagging and laughs as he slams the drawer shut, plunging you into darkness. A few stray whisps of light seep in through the cracks where the edges of the drawer don't line up perfectly with the dresser.

"When I come back, you'd better be a perfectly obedient little slave. Enjoy you're new home, because that's probably going to be where you stay." Mike quickly pulls on some clothes and runs downstairs to join his parents.

You look around. The drawer is huge, and the smelly socks lie about everywhere in haphazard fashion. What do you do?

11312222.content:
You sit down dejectedly, wondering how the hell you're going to get out of this one. You're sure there's no way you can budge the solid wood drawer, but you don't want to give up and just wait for Mike to return to his "slave", either, so rest and begin thinking desperately.

Your respite is interrupted almost as suddenly as it began, with the ringing tone of the doorbell from downstairs. Mike's parents wern't expecting company, were they? you hear the muffled sound of the door opening and hear Mike's mom's voice speaking in tones of pleasant surprise. Perhaps your parents have come to check up on you? Hope soars in you once again, but soon flickers down as you hear only what sound like two girl's voices in reply. Still, the possibility of escape seems better with someone else in the house to keep Mike
's family from leaving just yet....there's just the problem of moving this drawer. You hurl yourself bodily against it several times, but it won't budge.

Dazed, you sit down to rest once more. Thought of despair and helplessness are creeping in once more, when suddenly a loud crash sounds out from downstairs, and the unmistakable voice of Mike's mom utters an ear-piercing, deathly frightful shriek. What in the world is going on down there? More crashes echo from downstairs - sounds like furniture being knocked over, and more screams - you recognize Mike's voice in the mix - continue for several long seconds. Suddenly all is deathly silent. What just happened? You think to yourself.

The silence is broken once more by the frantic thumping of footsteps coming up the stairs. Voices - excited, teenage girls' voices - accompany the footsteps. What are they saying? "He's got to be up here! Upstairs, in Mike's room!" The door to Mike's room opens with a thud, and through the cracks of the drawer you can barely make out two distinct shadows moving. Furniture, blankets, clothing, toys are being flung aside - it's as if they're looking for something! Could it be you? Suddenly, the sock drawer is flung open, and the light momentarily blinds you before you look up into the eyes of ...

I'll always remember the sacrifice you made to me."

You wave back, and step onto the tip of her tongue, the soft and wet tongue compressing underneath your feet, the taste buds almost massaging them as spit pools arounf them. There is no longer light above you as you see the roof of her mouth, the light being almost non existent. You see the rows of her teeth lining her mouth as you look outside, seeing her bedroom as you get a look at the outside world for the last time. Her lips slowly begin to close, the two rows of teeth slowly coming together with a clinking sound as you're now completely sealed in darkness.

The tongue shifts underneath your body, moving you gently around the gigantic mouth as Nina plays with you, occasionally pressing you up against her cheek and holding you there so she can swallow the saliva that keeps building up. But eventually she gets bored, and you can feel the tongue shifting you near the back of her throat. 12312112.content:
“Honestly, I’d prefer a shower.” You smile. Your anal diving exploits have left you with a powerful odor. You don’t really mind it, but you’re sure it can’t be very hygienic.

Nina leaned in and sniffed lightly, “Woo, yeah, I think that would be for the best!” She giggled.

For the next five minutes Nina washes you off under a faucet with bar soap. You relax as Nina’s pudgy fingers kneed the soap into your skin. You could wash yourself but it feels really nice when she does it. After rinsing off the last of the suds, Nina wipes you against her shirt to dry you off.

“All right, that should do it. Now lets head downstairs for some breakfast, I’m starving!” With you in hand Nina exits the bathroom and rushes downstairs, her blonde pigtails bobbing up and down, and her small belly doing likewise.

Sandra, your best friend’s mother, is there, “Hi hon,” She says without looking up from the kitchen counter, “Breakfast is on the table.” You’re surprised she knew who it was without even looking but, then again, Mike’s youngest sister can pack it away. She’s probably always the first one to the table.

Nina sits down to a plate of scrambled eggs and toast. There’s a big glass of orange juice off to the side. She gives a squeal of delight looking at the mountain of gooey yellow goodness.

“Want some juice?” She asks you. She’s whispering to keep her mother from hearing her.

“Sure.”

Grinning Nina dangles you over her glass…. And drops you in, “There you go, enjoy!”

“Gee, thanks Nina.” You growl, trying to splash her with the pulp less juice. You’re too small and it’s difficult to aim. Nina just smiles and sticks out her tongue playfully. Soon enough though she’s attacking the eggs and toast on her plate. You’re amazed at how fast she can wolf it down. Forkful after forkful disappear into her cavernous mouth. She only needs a few seconds to nibble daintily, savoring the foods flavor and texture, before swallowing the mouthful.

“Those lucky eggs.” You mutter.

Nina smiles down at you happily, “They are lucky, aren’t they? Here, help me wash them down.” Picking up the glass of orange juice, Nina began to chug her beverage. You were forced to go with the flow, literally. The bright orange torrent pulled you downwards to her lips. You collided with them but they were very cushiony. With a smack, Nina set the glass back down and went back to shoveling eggs into her maw.

Eventually she reached for the glass again. You prepared yourself for Nina’s second sip. This time, however, things played out a bit differently. Before you could impact with her soft greedy lips again she opened wide. You fell face first onto her plump tongue. Nina let the orange juice drain down her throat, leaving you stranded there on the wriggly, pink muscle.

“Mmmmmmmmmm.” She moved you back in forth, tasting your entire body. It felt great as Mike’s sister continued to suck and prod you with her tongue. You were a bit afraid you’d be joining Nina’s eggs but, if that was the case, there wasn’t much you could do to fight. You just decided to enjoy the experience. It felt like a steamy massage. You couldn’t help but be a little jealous of Nina’s past meals as you were slowly covered in little girl saliva.

Eventually Nina opened her mouth and let you slide off her tongue and back into her hand. You shiver at the sudden change in temperature.

“Mike has good taste in friends.” The plump young giantess joked. Her cheeks suddenly puffed up a bit. A soft belch rolled off her lips…. Right on top of you! The burp smelled like the orange juice you’d been bathing in, “Excuse me.” Nina said cutely, “You’re going to help me if those stubborn eggs don’t want to come out later, right?”

You shiver with delight. You really should talk to Nina about speaking to her mom, and finding you a hospital, but instead, “Sure Nina. Digest them and I’ll help you out with your poop if it’s reluctant to come out again. Of course, can you really blame it? You have such a cute little hiney.” Coaxing out her turds had been a lot more satisfying than you would have imagined.

“That’s why I don’t get too mad at it. Why would it want to be flushed down the toilet when it could be here in a nice warm belly?” She rubbed her tummy softly.

Just then Stacy and Mike came down the steps. They took their places at the table. Stacy, who sat right next to Nina, saw you immediately. On her face was a look of shock, then delight!

Stacy is Mike’s other little sister, but she is several years older than Nina. She’s thinner and has darker hair. She has always had a huge crush on you. Recently she had become more open about it. Before she’d simply shyly stare at you but, recently, she had been following you around like a lovesick puppy. When you’d go over to Mike’s to watch a movie she’d sometimes plop down in your lap, wiggle to get comfy, then watch it with you. You, likewise, liked to playfully tease her and mess up her hair. Mike didn’t really like his sisters but you always found them to be cute, and you’d sometimes walk to school with Stacy (here school was on the way). Earlier that year, while attending a Christmas party at Mike’s, she’d followed you around until you were foolish enough to walk under some mistletoe. You’d given her a peck on the cheek and she’d turned redder than a fire hydrant.

Unlike Nina, who usually avoided you (but only because you were always with Mike, and Mike picked on her) You considered Stacy to be something of a friend. Or, at the very least, someone you could mess around with.

Stacy reached for you….. Only to have Nina pull her hand backwards, “Hey, he’s mine.”

“No way, you don’t even like him!” Stacy complained.

“Says who? He’s mine! Nyagh!!!!” Nina stuck out her tongue.

“Hey, what are you two fighting over?” Sandra asked annoyed, for the first time turning around. She spotted you clutched in Nina’s hand.

“Oh, him. I shrunk him last night.” Your eyes widened, Mike’s mom did this to you.

“But why?” Stacy asked confused. She wanted to get her hands on you but, she was curious why her mother had shrunk you.

“He saw me putting away the shrink ray last night. I told him it was one of Mike’s old toys but…. You can never be too careful.” Sandra clucked, “I had a talk with Mike last night. He was very good about the whole thing, agreeing that it would be a good idea to shrink and dispose of him.”

So THAT’S what the gun was. You’d actually believed her when she said it was just a toy. Suddenly you felt sick to your stomach. Mike agreed to let his mom get rid of you? You looked over at your now giant friend but he seemed unconcerned, even now. Mike had always been pretty stoic and easy going. When his mother had told him she needed to get rid of you he had probably just shrugged.

“I was wondering why he was so tiny.” Nina commented.

Looking up at her you remember she’d only been a little surprised to find you shrunk in the bathroom. Mike’s whole family must be pretty familiar with the shrink gun.

“Yes, well, I figured I’d shrink him and let Mike play with him a little before getting rid of him. Seems you got to him first though, huh sweetie? I’m surprised he isn’t in that little tummy of yours.”

Sandra extended her hand and Nina dropped you onto her palm, “I would have, but he was very nice to me.” Nina explained, “I like him.”

“So….. I’m guessing you aren’t going to grow me back to normal size?”

Mike’s mother shook her head, “We can’t have anyone know about the shrink ray and live. We all like to shrink and eat people.” Sandra explained, looked down and making eye contact with you, “If word got out about the device, people might start to suspect something.”

“I had the paper boy yesterday.” Nina explained. “He was always throwing the paper too hard, once he knocked over a potted plant. Mommy let me have him. He was really feisty, I guess he must have really liked it in here.” She lifted up her shirt and tapped her belly button, “I love it when boys squirm and jiggle in my tummy.” Nina confided.

“So you eat them alive?” You ask fascinated. For some reason, even though you have your best friends family looming over you, talking about eating people, you aren’t scared. In fact you’re feeling a tingling sensation in your crotch. The idea of getting eaten and added to someone’s waistline is scaring, yet exciting.

“Yup!” Nina smiled, answering your question.

“It’s so much better when you swallow people whole.” Stacy told you excitedly, “The only time I ever chewed was when I had your girlfriend Jessica….. She was so disagreeable, even as a meal. She gave me bad gas.” Stacy let her hand land on her belly as she remembered devouring your girl.

She had disappeared a month ago, you hadn’t minded too much though. She’d been cheating on you and stealing your money, you had been planning to break up with her. It made sense she’d now that she’d disappear into Stacy, who wanted you all to herself. Thinking back now you remember that a lot of people had disappeared over the past few years, more than what could be considered normal. There was also that bus of high school students (from the district beside yours) that had disappeared half a year ago. You shiver as you realize all thirty two of them had probably been eaten, digested, and shitted out by Mike, Sandra, Nina, and Stacy.

“Well, we can’t have you scurrying around. I’m very sorry but I have to dispose of you.” Sandra explained.

Nina and Stacy looked at each other, then back over at you.

“You really don’t need to, I won’t tell anyone.” Though the idea of going from family friend to family calories was a somewhat appealing one, you wanted to live.

“Sorry, but you’re not growing big again. I just can’t risk you telling people our secret. I’ll make it quick, just a flick of my fingers and I could break you neck for you. Then I’ll flush you. It’ll be quick and painless. Or I suppose I could give you a pleasurable end. I’ve had some lonely nights these last few years and my….‘toy’ ran of batteries last night. We could, entertain eachother until you were crushed, and then I could flush ya.”

“Mom!” Stacy stood up looking antsy, “Just give him to me!”

“Um, do I have to die at all? I can’t really tell anyone anything at this size.”
“That’s true….” Sandra said slowly.

You looked over at the kids. Hopefully they would back you up. The recently not so shy Stacy, your best friend Mike, hungry but playful Nina, they all liked you. You knew even Sandra liked you, to some extent. Now that you were a liability though, would the once friendly family dispose of you?

12312112112.content:
Nina and Sandra disappear from your view so you sink downward, allowing Stacy’s waistband to once more slip over your head. Leaning back, you feel Stacy’s soft butt cheeks part slightly to accept you. Each step she takes up the staircase causes one cheek to rise and the other to descend. You give a contented sigh as the shifting cheeks rhythmically massage your sides. Maybe things won’t be so bad.

A minute later, Stacy is fishing you out of her hiney. Her fingers gently wrap around your torso and pluck you out of her crack. The young girl raises you up to her face and she gives you a sassy smile, before blowing you a kiss. You smile at her; despite being a man-eater, and fifty times your size, she’s a cute kid. Looking around at your surroundings, you realize you’re in her room, “Stacy, don’t you need to go to the bathroom?”

“No, I’m not constipated. I just said that so that mom would agree to keep you.”

“Yeah, I was kind of surprised all three of you were having trouble pooping.” You confess.

“If they stopped eating junk food all the time it wouldn’t be a problem. I’ve got a good diet with a lot of fruits and veggies. My poops come out nice and easy, I have no trouble squeezing out turds twice your size.” Stacy confides.
“Wow, that’s… impressive.”

She smiles, happy that she was able to impress you. Stacy shows you around her room, showing you where you’ll be living from now on. Stacy wants you to sleep next to her bed if her mother will allow it. For the most part, it’s your typical preteen girl’s room. The only thing that seems out of place is a frilly bra with a large cup size that she has mounted over her bed.

“Stacy, what’s that?” You ask, pointing.

The eleven year old scrunches her nose, “That belonged to your old girlfriend.” After a few seconds her look of distaste turned into a mischievous smile, “I decided to keep as a memento after winning our argument.” You don’t need to ask her what the argument was about; you know how Stacy feels about you.

Stacy gently sets you on her bed then plops down beside you. “I know I can convince mom to keep you. She likes you, and you’ve been Mike’s best friend for years, so you don’t need to worry about winding up like the others. We just need to show her that you can do chores for us girls.” Stacy tries to reassure you. A shiver runs down your spine; a mixture of dread and excitement.

The thought of disappearing into one of Mike’s family members, via one orifice or another, is terrifying yet strangely alluring. You can’t help but fantasize about the families’ previous victims. How many had vanished into Stacy’s trim tummy, or the hungry forest between Sandra’s legs? If your communities’ growing epidemic of men, women, and children being reported as missing is any indication, than probably several hundred.

“I’ll be nearby for when Nina has her turn; she’s a little piggy, but I’ll protect you.”

You smile up at the titanic preteen. You’re thankful that she’s concerned about your safety, but you don’t think Nina’s going to hurt me, “I’m not too worried about Nina. Your sister could have drunk me down with her orange juice at breakfast, if she really wanted to. I don’t think she’s going to gobble me up. Besides, after I spend some time in her behind, I’m not going to smell very appetizing.”

“I hope you’re right… Just be careful when you’re around her.” You spend the next fifteen minutes talking with Stacy on her bed, as the young girl clumsily tries to flirt with you. Eventually there’s a knock at the door. Stacy opens it to find an eager looking Nina standing there. The moderately chubby little girl is bouncing on her feet in anticipation, causing her thick, blond pigtails to bob up and down. While Stacy is grim faced, you feel at ease. After your exploits in the bathroom that morning, you suspect that you and Nina are well on the way to forming a solid friendship. With some reluctance, Stacy places you in her little sister’s outstretched hands.

…………………………………………………..

4 weeks have passed and you’re now officially the family pet. As demeaning as it is to be a pet, you’re starting to prefer it to your old lifestyle. There’s no longer a need to worry about schoolwork, or mowing the lawn, or placating your parents. All you have to do is try to please the three females of the household, which is something that you honestly enjoy. The first week Sandra ran you ragged, forcing you to do a number of painful and degrading things, but it didn’t take long before she started treating you more like a tiny house guest than a tiny slave.

You’ve done a number of different chores for the family, from massaging Sandra’s plump tootsies after a killer day at the office, to helping Stacy with her math homework, to hammering on Nina’s perky little anus to help her release one of her more stubborn stools. The chores started off as mandatory but, as Sandra and Nina warmed up to you, they became voluntary.

Mike wrote you off as dead the day you shrunk. He now acts as if you don’t exist, which hurts, but his two kid sisters have all but replaced him. Stacy and Nina have quickly become your new best friends, despite them being younger than you and much, much bigger.

You can’t help but resent Mike; not just for turning his back on you, but for always being mean to his sisters. You and Stacy have always gotten along well, and Nina is proving to be a playful and considerate (if gluttonous) girl. They treat you more like a family member than a pet, and you’re grateful to them. Your relationship with Stacy is so good, you could probably convince her to use the shrink gun to return you to your normal size, but why would you? You love your new life!

Today you find yourself

1232.content:
Upon sliding under the door into the bathroom, you see the young Stacy slip down off the toilet seat, turning to pull the level which echoes a loud flush through the bathroom around you. Upon landing on her feet, she leaned forward to her legs and pulled up what looked to be a white and purple patterned pull-up, a child friendly butterfly print shown on the padding for a moment between her legs before she stepped out of the pair of pink pajama pants in which she had worn to bed last night, it being the middle of winter; she needed to be wearing warm PJ's, hence the matching pink pajama long sleeve top

Stacy was a nice girl, she was always kind to me unlike her younger sister who didn't seem quite as fond of me. I was glad that of the two it ended up being this sister, Nina probably would have tortured me in some cruel, childish manner like stick me in her doll house and dress me up. Stacy here had always been a bed-wetter for as long as I could remember, it didn't seem to phase her all that much, she was happy and chirpy for the most part, and didn't seem to mind displaying her pull-ups to guests that she knew well. She could usually be seen at night walking around in just a t-shirt of some kind and her padding.

My instant reaction was an attempt to wave and get her attention, not only was it a relief to see someone who I liked, but it was also a blessing that it happened to be one of the most helpful people in this house. Unfortunately, having apparently just woken, Stacy was nothing short of half asleep, her steps were kind of lazy and halfhearted.

"Stacy! Stacy!!" I call out, jumping up and down with all my heart as I yell my lungs out in my attempt to draw her attention. The young girl let out a cute, childish yawn as she walked straight past me and towards the shower lifting off and stripping the pink sleepwear top from her torso one button at a time, leaving her in only the pull-up now. I gave a soft sigh to myself, giving up on jumping as she slid the pull-up down her slim legs, stepping out of it as it lays flat on the cold tiled floor at her feet, ending up canceling out the point of pulling it back on a few seconds ago, unless she did that to stay warm down there for that small amount of time... It didn't matter I guess. The girl stepped into the shower not seconds later, the sound of hot water being turned on then being the only sound filling the bathroom.

Stacy was probably going to be a while now, which meant that I at least had some time to figure out a way to get her attention. I looked around the room briefly, seeing a couple of potential options. She had a fresh pair of clothes on the basin bench beside the toilet, a hand towel hanging down from beside it; being a way to climb up. But there was also the towel rack at the right wall, and the towels there may be easier to climb than the one at the basin. She was going to have to go to either of them before she could leave the bathroom either way.

12321.content:
Deciding to climb up to the clothes, you nod your head enthusiastically to yourself, beginning your sprint across the cold white tiled floor. It may take a little long to get up to the basin, but it was probably safer that risking blending in with the white towels in which she would surely dry herself off with, it would probably squash you like a bug if she rubbed you up against her body between the towel unknowingly.

It ended up being easier to leg it across the smooth white tiles that it was to get across the carpet earlier on, and the long hand towel was just long enough for you to reach as it hung of the side of the basin, but it was nothing short of a long way up. This was going to be tough...

Giving your arms a slight stretch, you jump up onto the towel, which keeps it's grip on the basin with your not so notable weight pulling on it. With all of the fibers sticking out of the towel, there was plenty of grip for you to climb up. The key now was not to look down...

The vertical scale was difficult, but turned out to be quicker than you would have thought, pulling yourself up onto the edge of the tabletop after just a few minutes. Your body was worn out, though the adrenalin from the surprisingly exhilarating climb was pumping through you. In front of you; a pile of clothes sat beside the basin. A white girls sundress was the feature of the pile, it was plain in color but had some nice patterns stitched into the belly and chest. Of course at this time of year that wouldn't be enough to keep Stacy warm, hence the pair of black leggings folded up under it to keep her legs from freezing. Finally, there was a simple white jacket, thick enough to keep her warm by the looks of it. Somewhere in the pile there was sure to be a pair of panties, but you couldn't see them at the moment.

The shower suddenly turned off, the sound of 'pattering' water halting from inside the shower. You looked over to see the fogged glass door swinging open slowly, the young, clean Stacy stepping out to press her warm, steaming foot down on the cold tiles, making her body shiver slightly in response to the cold surface.

In almost an instant, you had climbed up onto her folded dress, gathering your balance on the cushion like surface and standing up right. At four inches tall, you should stand out at least a little bit if she's looking to her clothes when she reaches to pick them up. Before she could do that though, she absentmindedly reached to the towels on the rack opposite the shower, grabbing the closest one and instinctively unfolding it in her hands, not seeming all to focused on what she was doing. It was a good thing that you hadn't chose to go there, otherwise you would have been squashed against her hair as she rubs the towel against her head to dry off her hair. She proceeded to dry off the rest of her body in a quick manner, just wanting to get her clothes on so she could be warm again.

Stacy was only a year younger than you at her age of Eleven, honestly you have had a crush on her for a while now, but you never really thought that you would see her like this. And you didn't want to seem like a pervert or anything, but at this point you didn't want to look away, lest you miss your chance to try and wave her down and she doesn't save you.

After what seems like forever of anticipation, she finally hangs the towel back on the rack and turns to walk over to you. Her naked body stood over you as she approached you, giving you full view upon her bare form. Not that you were trying to focus on anything but her eyes as you begin to jump up and down again. The soft surface under you feet made bouncing difficult, but it didn't stop you from crying out her name-

"Stacy! Please!!" You call out desperately, waving your arms about.

She...

A sigh of relief runs through your body as the young girl looks down to see you. Her eyes widen in surprise as she does, letting out a small gasp of shock. Looking up to her, you meet the girls stare. She was lost for words at first, but quickly gained some sense of what was happening and lowered her left hand between her legs to cover her secret area in a shy way.

"W-what happened!?" She asks in a very sudden question, her voice blasting over you like a Loud Speaker right in front of you. This gave cause to cover your ears to shield them from the sound, not that it helped all to much. It still boomed through your body like a shock-wave. She covered her mouth childishly with her free right hand upon seeing this, then whispering in a much more comfortable way the simple word "Sorry".

You give a slight shake of your head, speaking out the barely audible words;
"It's fine... Don't worry about it". Stacy gave a soft nod of her head, lowering her hand from her mouth.
"And I don't know what happened... I just woke up like this" You admit with a soft sigh, looking down to your feet for a moment before looking back up to the girl as her body shivered slightly, obviously cold in the white tiled bathroom, the warm steam from her recent shower just now starting to clear up.

"Look, I really need to get changed.." She says in an almost shy way of speaking, taking a step closer to the bench, her smooth, flat belly at eye level with you.
"Could you just... Step off my clothes and turn around?" She requests, motioning a little spinning movement with her free hand's index finger. You couldn't help but blush slightly, you had been this entire time, but you only recognized it now. Realizing that you had paused in this moment, you quickly but simply nod your head, clambering quickly to get off the pile of clothes and landing on the tabletop, simply turning your back to her and hearing the clothing removed from the table beside you, the sound of her getting dressed being gradually heard.

1232111.content:
You keep your eyes too yourself, your back turned to Stacy as the sounds of her clothes slipping onto her bare body can be heard as she dresses herself. Once again, you were thankful that it was Stacy that found you, she had to be one of the friendliest people that you could think of.

It only took a few moments for her to hastily get changed, the sounds of her footsteps tapping loudly (To you) across the tiled floor as she leans over to pick her pajamas up off the ground, as well as the white and purple, wet pull-up diaper that she had worn to bed the night before. With that, the next thing that you heard was her walks back over to you, but you waited until told to turn around, just in case.

"Okay, you can look now" She directs in a kind way, causing you to turn and face her. The clothes she wore weren't anything special, but they did fit comfortably too her body, the black leggings standing out above the sundress purely for their dark color, but you could see the form of her fine legs quite easily with them too.
"So... How do we fix this?" She asked, kneeling down in front of you and resting her chin on the edge of the tabletop to be roughly at eye level with you. There was no real answer to that, you didn't know how this had happened, nothing stood out as a moment that could have caused this. It's not like you had been skulking through any magical ruins lately that could have cursed you or anything. Looking too her after a few moments of thinking, you simply gave a shrug of your shoulders, giving her cause to sigh quietly at the seemingly hopeless situation.

"Maybe we should take you to my mom... She might know what to do?" Stacy suggests. "Otherwise, I have to go to daycare today, you can come with me and we can try to figure this out?" She proceeded to tell you, her big beautiful green eyes blinking every so often as she stares down at your small form.

Stacy's mom always... Intimidated you. It's not that she was a bad person, she was nice enough you suppose, but there was just something off about her. She was the kind of person that you could see in an Insane Asylum one day for killing people with poisoned cookies that everyone felt comfortable eating up until the point their hearts stopped. But that being said, she was the oldest one here and might know what was going on to some degree.

As the other option went, it was a weekend and Stacy's mom did have to work in a few hours. So knowing that your savior had to be at Daycare today shouldn't have slipped your mind as it had until now. The thought of being around a few kids wasn't all to appealing either, but it felt a little more comfortable to try and figure this out with Stacy as apposed to going to her Mom.

Both options had risks...

Keep you close and safe" She goes on to say, sounding a little unsure of herself, never having taken care of another person before in her life, at least not on her own. She had looked after her baby Eric brother before with Nina helping her, but even then there was an adult in the house with them; this was much different to that. At least you were mature enough in mind to know what was right and wrong, you wouldn't go playing with knives, even if you could...

"Well... Should I carry you...?" She questions in an unsure tone of voice, obviously not exactly used to asking such questions or knowing the answers to them. Her outfit boasted very few opportunities to conceal you, any signs of pockets merely for decoration more than practicality, none being more than a few centimeters deep. That being said, her carrying you openly would surely have you be spotted by any number of people or creatures.

"How...?" You reply in the most simple way possible, looking her over quickly again for any sign of pockets or some such, but once again seeing none.

"Well..." She starts, thinking about options for a moment...

123211121.content:
"Oh! I have an idea!" She exclaims enthusiastically, reaching down her left hand and laying it flat on its back on the table beside the white basin next to you. "Come on!" She calls, obviously happy with her thought as she holds the palm of her hand ready for you to step onto.

"Uhh... Okay then..." You reply in yet another tone implying of being unsure, not having much choice but to step up onto the fingers flat in front of you and leaning forward onto your hands for support, deciding it better to crawl to the palm of her hand rather than walk, just in case she lifted said hand up suddenly and caused you to lose balance, falling to what would surely be a painful stop on the table behind you.

It was easy enough to crawl to the base of her palm, even at three inches tall her hand was not all to big compared to you. Her hand lifted from the table, blowing a rush of air over you as she does so quite quickly and suddenly. Her right arm holding the pink pajamas from the night before, the wet pull-up diaper sitting open on top of them. Before you knew it, you were sitting down on her palm as she walked to the bathroom door, opening it slowly and quietly before peeking out into the empty corridor, looking both ways to make sure it was clear and then proceeding quickly across it to the door of her room, opening that up and slipping inside whilst being careful not to tilt her hand or do anything that would endanger you.

The bedroom door was closed behind you with what as a loud 'thud' to your senses right now, though to anyone else it was just a soft little sound that seemed intentionally quiet. The room of Stacy and Nina was fairly dark at this early time of the morning, but even so the pale purple walls were obvious as to imply that this was a girls room. Their large Queen size double bed was set up against the left wall with pink sheets, Nina still sleeping soundly on her day off, though she would have to wake up soon enough to go to Daycare with her older sister, Stacy. In the middle of the room there was a simple red and white colored rug, a few of the girls dolls and plush toys spread around this area, and over to the right side was a large open doll house with some nice enough looking miniature furniture which, much to your hesitation of admitting, you could be fairly sure you would be able to comfortably use all of at your size right now.

Stacy walked you over to the old wooden wardrobe at the back right corner of the room, pulling its right door open quietly, trying not to wake Nina as she does so, revealing a large assortment of different clothes, socks, some shoes and bags down the bottom, and a well stocked shelf of at least three dozen of the white pull-up diapers in which both the girls wore to bed. You feel and see yourself lifted up, Stacy's smooth hand tilting you forward and edging you onto a shelf at her eye level, being the one stocked with padding for their bed-wetting. Following as she implies, you slide down off her hand, managing to land on the wooden shelf in a fairly balanced way on your feet as Stacy ducks down out of view to retrieve a bag from the bottom shelf.

A few seconds later, she stands back up into view, holding a star patterned purple and white bag in her hands, already open. The girl leans in closer to you, looking over her shoulder for a second to check that her sister was still asleep before whispering too you;
"I'm gonna pack some stuff for Daycare, and you can hide in my bag. Okay?" She points out, adding the 'okay' at the end just to check that you understood that all to simple instructions.

"Got it" You call out, though instinctively lowering your voice a little to avoid waking Nina, then realizing that it didn't make much of a difference at your current size, Nina couldn't hear you from across the room even if you yelled at the top of your lungs. The gave a happy nod in your direction, starting to grab a few different clothes from the shelves around you.

You simply sat there as she went through the stages of different things, gathering just another set of clothes for her day away from home.

Over her shoulder however when Stacy closes one of the sock drawers a little to hard with a slam, the sight of Nina shifting around in bed could be seen and heard.

"Nnn..." The younger sister groaned tiredly, looking over to Stacy with her tired just awoken eyes. "Sis... What are you doing...?" She asked with both curiosity and fatigue in her voice. Stacy couldn't help but look to you with worry in her eyes, her body tensing up. She had never been a good liar, not that she really had to in this situation, but the older sister was on edge about you being found out, especially after the enthusiasm you had both displayed about wanting to do this yourselves without help, she had taken it as a bit of a challenge to not let anyone find out about you.

"I'm... Uhh... Just getting some stuff... For Daycare... Obviously" She points out, sounding fairly defensive about it. If it was anyone but Nina, then some suspicion may have arisen, but being so young and tired, she was fairly oblivious to it. Looking over Stacy's shoulder, you watch as the younger sister lazily slips out of the bed behind her. Stacy gasps a little, doing the first thing that comes to mind without looking to discrete about it. She quickly grabs you in her right hand, pushing you back whilst being as gentle as was humanly possible in such rush as she pushes you back into the diapers behind you, ending up pressing you through the provided hole for the pull-ups' wearer to step into. Your back as pressed to what was the base of the fluffy white padding at the bottom of the diaper if it was being worn, making you let out a breath of shock as your body is pressed back so suddenly. The large hand pulls away quickly as Nina approaches Stacy's side.

"I had an accident..." Nina admits to her big sister, standing on the tips of her toes as she reaches for the shelf of fresh pull-ups. "I'm just gonna get changed and head back to bed for a lil..." She continues tiredly in a childish way, reaching for the closest diaper available to get changed into...

1232111211.content:
In a very quick sudden movement, the single pile of clean padding that you were hidden vulnerably within is picked up from the shelf. For a moment you were afraid that Nina had grabbed the single pull-up in which you were taking cover, but it turns out that Stacy had once again saved you, dropping the entire pile into the bag in her left hand, leaving Nina to grab another from the shelf.
"So... Why are you packing our night time diapers? And why that many?" The little sister asks curiously, looking up to Stacy. "We don't usually have to stay there overnight..." She continues, slipping the wet, used pull-up down her young slim legs onto the floor as she opens up the fresh one in her hands.

"Well... Maybe we do have to stay there tonight. Did you think about that?" Stacy replies in another equally defensive way as she had before, completely missing the question about why so many as she presses the diapers down into the bag so they would all fit, squishing you a little, not enough to do any real harm, not under all this soft and bulky padding that pressed against your body on every side, but it was overly restricting.

"...Fine, whatever" Nina speaks back, now sounding a little intimidated by her big sister but taking a slightly aggressive tone. Stacy quite quickly felt bad about this, but she had to keep you safe and she wasn't the best at making up excuses for things such as this. Nina quickly gets changed, sliding the fresh diaper up her legs and out of sight up her purple Night Gown before storming back to bed, her back to her sister as she curls up under the blankets, now in a bad and grumpy mood.

There is a pause of silence in the room, Stacy very quickly feeling drowned in guilt. With a sigh to herself, she moves to exit the room, opening and walking through the door with her bag in hand, then quietly closing it in consideration for her sister.

Everything halts inside the bag, nothing moving about to show that Stacy was walking at this point. You let things pass for a moment before you get a little worried. The pull-ups around you had puffed up a little after being squashed down so they would fit in the bag, taking the pressure off you and allowing you to move. You slowly slip your small body out the left leg hole of the diaper, into the actual bag itself, the black fabric inside being not all that much easier to move around in than the diaper was. But still, you pressed your back to the fabric for support as you stood up, holding onto the side of the diapers for grip as you start to climb, gradually making your way to the top of the bag.

Upon reaching the top, the open zip allowed you to see up out of the bag. There, Stacy was standing over you, just looking down at her feet with a sad expression on her face.

"Umm... Stacy?" You call out in a soft, friendly manner. "Are you okay?" Your voice asks in n almost parental tone. She looks down to you, her eyes were slightly watery and sad, but she wasn't crying. You hadn't seen Stacy like this before, not since she was nearly five years younger at least.

"Y-yeah... I'm fine. I... I just don't like it when Nina is angry at me..." She tells you, which made sense really, they were very close for the most part, Stacy was the only person that Nina didn't like to annoy with her magic and such.

Stacy eventually lets out a quiet sigh, standing back up straight and lifting the bag into her arms, making you stumble over at the sudden movement and falling over onto the pile of soft diapers under your feet, making your landing harmless.

"Anyway, mom will want to take Nina and I to daycare soon... Guess I'd better go find her..." She says too herself, just loud enough for you to hear as she grabs the zip of the bag, starting to pull it closed, letting you get back into hiding within her belongings.
1232111211.title: Saved, again

12321112111.content:
Not half an hour later, you found yourself easily very bored inside Stacy's backpack.

You had heard a few conversations up until now between various people, but none of which were of any interest at all. Did you pack your lunch, do you have your pajamas in case you have to stay the night, things like that. As of recently, you had found yourself in the car of this family. Of course, you had been sitting on this pile of diapers for quite some time, though ready to jump down the side of the pile into the clothes if worst came to worst and you risked being seen in this vulnerable state. It was actually quite comfortable here on this padding, maybe not as soft as your bed at home but still not bad considering the circumstance at hand.

Eventually, this so far ten minute drive had felt like forever, you were curious and kind of energetic. This this, you stand up, trying not to make the bag shift or something to that effect that may arouse suspicion to those around you.

With the initial shock and fear of this hour passed following your awakening to being this small, you were now more curious to see things from the new perspective in which you were given this morning. The zip of the bag was on the far left, a little opening in sight where a centimeter or so had been left for you to breathe through if it was too stuffy in here. In this case though, it provided a hole for you to see through to catch a glimpse of what was happening outside. To the left of Stacy, whose lap the bag was sitting on, her younger toddler brother sat in her baby seat. He wore a blue t-shirt and a pair of tracksuit like baggy pants that failed to hide the bulk of the diaper that he wore at the time. He seemed to be playing with some Action Figures, some characters in which you couldn't recall seeing before, probably Japanese figures from a show that you hadn't seen, they looked kind of cool you guessed, there was some appeal.

Further on down the seat, Nina was asleep against the car door, curled up on the seat in a surprisingly cute manner, 'cute' not usually something you considered Nina, not that she was unattractive or anything, but she was usually stepping on your foot or harassing you with her magic. She was still dressed in her pajamas, it would seem that her mom didn't have the time to change her or anything like that, probably something she would leave to the Daycare employees, not that it really bothered you.

Either way, it seemed like a better idea to stay in the bag for now, there's no telling what Stacy's little brother would do with you if her caught you, as he chewed gently on the head of the 'doll' in his right hand, the other toy having now disappeared into his diaper for 'safe keeping'.

Then again...

You don't laugh.

You smile. Being her pet is not what you had planned for the rest of her life. Especially since you had so much you wanted to do. But it would mean a life of good food and lots of cuddles. You even imagine riding in her panties.

Nina looks at you confused, obviously not picking up on your sarcasm.

"You want to be poo?..... Mike's got some weird friends! Okay, if that's what you want I'll eat you."

You try to scream that you were only joking but it's too late. Nina crammed the PB&J sandwich into her mouth and started devouring it ravenously. You barely avoiding her menacing teeth as the tear at the sandwich. Using her tongue she moves drenches the bite of sandwich you're in with saliva and presses you against the roof of her mouth. You sit in complete darkness inside Nina's body as she skips away, totally engulfed in a squashed wad of peanut-butter and jelly sandwich. You feel peanut butter glopped against your closed eyelids, against your skin, and even in your mouth, with a second layer of spongy bread squishing against you as you try to shift around and free yourself from the gloppy mass. The compressed bread and peanut butter is too thick and cumbersome to escape from.

Suffering from momentary amnesia due to the fall, you wonder what has happened to you as you sit embedded in the glop. You notice it gradually getting warmer, and soon the bread begins to liquify, and another taste makes it's way to your mouth. It is sour, acrid and hot, and confirms beyond a doubt what your situation has become; You are actually alive and inside the stomach of Mike's little sister. You panic for a moment, opening your eyes to a tremendous stinging before closing them again, impulsively trying to reach through the muck to rub them. You find you cannot accomplish even this simple feat under the weight of the sandwich, and your skin has begun to tingle and feel strangely hot. With equal panic you realize it must be because of Nina's gastric juices--the acids in the young girl's stomach are attempting to dissolve your skin!

You squirm and shove against the spongy mass that has you pinned down, but to no avail. As the stomach begins to slowly churn the sandwich, and you along with it, it shoves you deeper and deeper into itself until soon there is no hope of escape. You writhe in fear and a number of other rather unique feelings as you are digested surprisingly thoroughly by the tiny girl.

In the outside world, Sandra laughs when Nina tells her what has happened to you. Smiling she comments on growing girls needing their nutrients. She thanks her youngest daughter for disposing of you. Mike would be dissapointed when he learned his little sister had his best friend for breakfast but he'd get over it.

Mike's mom stares at you for several moments, her face unreadable. Then she slowly frowns a little, "Feed you to one of my kids? That seems like a truly awful, and disgusting thing to do to my poor children. Why on earth would I want you to go inside of their little bodies?"
You can't help but think a little over how she is concerned about it being disgusting for her children, and not for you... But then again, you are to die, right? so why should she care?
You look up at her, and smile weakly, "Well, your children are still growing, right? They need a lot of good food, and good protein, for their bodies to use to grow up big and strong and, to be healthy, active kids... And, well, what better source of protein, and, nutrients, then a fellow person?"
She seems to think on this, tilting her head back, and staring up at the ceiling in thought. You know you are starting to persuade her, you just need to go a bit more...
"Heh, and you know how strong young stomachs are... When they are, through with me, there won't be a thing left for the feds to find. And, would they even check your kid's poop?"
She smiles, and chuckles some, "Who knows, but I would imagine not, why look there?" She smiles a bit more, her face starting to look, a little twisted, and evil. "But you are right you know... What better way for you to be disposed of, then through my children's poop? No one will ever suspect..."
She suddenly grins, and giggles excitedly, then as she calms down a little, she seems to murrrrr to herself. Perhaps, she likes the idea of you becoming her kid's food? Perhaps, she is, turned on, by the thought of you digesting in the tummies of one of her kids, and then becoming their poop?
She suddenly grins down at you, "Alright, little man, I will let you have that fate!" She raises an eyebrow, "Hmmmm, but I wonder, if I should just drop you into some of their food, or give you to one of them, and tell them what I want done to you?" She ponders this a moment....

You think about it a few moments, considering who you would want to give yourself to... Nina has, always had a bit of an appeal to you. You can't explain why, just something about her attitude. You know Stacy has a crush on you, though you never really felt the same for her. But then again... Mike is your best friend, and, well, you kind of had a thing for him... You would watch him, and admire his form some....
You come to a decision, and smile up at Mike's Mom, "Well, how about, you give me to Mike? I am sure he'd love to get to play with his friend a little while more, and, to have me sacrifice myself to his hungry belly..."
She beams down at you, and chuckles, "Oh, what a sweet thought! I know he'll love getting you all to himself... I am sure there are a lot of things he'd want to do with, and say to, you before it's snack time.." She chuckles, as she starts walking upstairs to Mike's room, humming carelessly to herself as she goes, obviously not the least bit concerned at all...
You on the other hand, are quite nervous, and, even excited... You had always admired Mike's form, though never had the courage to do more then glance and think about it now and again. But now, you can experience something with him, you never even dreamed of!
Suddenly, you find yourself outside his closed bedroom door. Mike's mom knocks on it, and there's a few second wait.
Finally, Mike opens the door, and you can't help but make a small gasp. There he is, standing in only his underpants. You can see his firm, toned, taunt chest and stomach, his long, strong, muscular legs supporting his, to you, massive powerful body. He is nearly hairless, which is one thing that always appealed to you. And now, you can see a small bit of a bulge in his underpants, not from arousal, just from his package carelessly hanging around as it is prone to do.
He looks at his mom curiously, not noticing you yet. "Yes mom?"
She beams at him, and holds you out, which makes you grip her thumb to keep from falling to your death. "I told your friend here that he had to be gotten rid of. He asked me if I could give him to you, as a snack." She giggles, and holds you out to him, "He is all yours now, sweety, you can do as you like with him; anything at all. Just make sure that sooner rather then later, he is sent to your handsome stomach."

Mike blinks, looking suprised, as he automatically reaches out and takes a hold of you, pulling you close to his chest, holding his palm flat. He blinks again, watching as his mom suddenly turns and starts walking away without another word, or a glance back at you.
Slowly, he lowers his face, to stare at you, and comprehend just how small you are... Then, you see recognition in his eyes, as he realizes it's you who was shrunk, and, who was asking, volunteering, to be sacrificed to his ever hungry male belly. Slowly, an eager expression comes into his eyes, and he actually grins hugely down at you. You can't help but shiver, and moan a little, feeling, very excited by the realization that, he is all too eager to take advantage of this rare opportunity, and, to play with his tiny best friend for a while, before he carelessly snacks on you, just like you asked for...

"So, i'm supposed to eat you now, is that right? I guess I gotta do what I gotta do..." says Mike with a sly smirk on his face.

And then, it's down the esophagus to my belly, where you'll be slowly melted away in my digestive juices. After that is a long and winding trip through my intestines, where you'll turn brown and start to become solid again, and then... sometime tomorrow or the day after, I poop you out!"

135211121.content:
You can't help yourself. You yell, scream, and plead all the way down. His muscles are strong. Powerful. Superior. To his gullet, you are just another piece of food that needs digesting. But here, gathered tightly in the muscular grip of your friend's body, sliding easily down, down, down, down, past his beating heart in the hot humid and slimy confines of the esophagus, you smile. This part actually feels pretty good. His muscles work you over like a powerful massage. Of course, this is the last gift Mike will give you. From now on, all the giving is going to be from you to him. Except for your free water burial, of course.

"Dude, I can feel you sliding down, squirming all the way, that feels awesome! I wonder how long i'll feel you..." Mike calls out to your descending form. No longer a bulge in his neck, you approach the last portal your conscious body will ever pass through and smell his vile stomach juices. The boiling pool beneath you sits poised to do its job of making you into a nutritious soup.

Your helpless body splashes into Mike's stomach. You start thrashing and flailing instinctively as the acids start breaking down your skin. The feeling is tingly, almost pleasant at first. But in a matter of minutes, you realize the foolish decision you made. Yes, this is a sacrifice after all. You howl out in pain, and Mike, with a sadistic flair enjoys your agonized woe.

He runs to his mom. "Well, he's in my stomach now. I can hear him crying and flopping around. Should I burp his air out?"

She answers "If you want to put him out of his misery. Otherwise, keep gulping down fresh air for him to breathe, and he'll stay alive longer. You'll feel him longer that way."

"Sorry, pal," Mike gulps down some air "This feels way too good to stop now. Keep it up, and I promise, i'll put on a good show with your remains."

You scream in terror, knowing your agony only serves to please your giant friend's sick desires. You submit to your fate and suffer the poor choice you made to sacrifice yourself to your friend's hunger. SLOWLY. ALL. DAY.

Finally, when you give up, Mike burps out your air having felt you struggle in his tummy for 5 hours. It seemed like 5 years to you. You were thinking how much of a relief it would be just to be his poop. Being poop is easy - getting turned into poop is the scary part!

Thankfully, you couldn't feel any more pain, but you weren't exactly... gone. You still have conscious thought. You still experience everything that the food undergoes, and you do it with grim fascination at the gross transformation. Throughout the day and the next, Mike goes on with his life, occasionally ripping a good fart and thinking of you when he does. You snake your way through the perilous coils of his gut slowly turning into a lump of crap, being turned a greenish-brown by his juices and then solidified into a nice looking turd. Just like you expected! But you didn't expect to still have some consciousness when it was happening. You didn't count on the utter horror and humiliation of being turned into poop while it was happening. Sure the thought was sick, but to smell yourself getting stinkier, to feel yourself get slimy and dry, to hear the squelching and glorping of your best friend's bowels - it's too much.

The next night, Mike goes to another friend's house. He's having some of the guys over for a sleepover. He intends to keep his promise about putting on a good show. He feels the pressure you're putting on his rectum and excuses himself to the bathroom. Turning the camera on himself, he goes through a phase of goofy looking faces while he goes through a phase of grunting sounds pretending to push. In reality, you just kind of slide out, but not until he moves the camera under his butt and captures your undignified escape.

Eventually, Mike's poop lays floating and coiled in the toilet bowl - light brown and green in color and a terrible smell to boot, he feels he is done. He wipes smudges of you onto some toilet paper. He takes the camera back into his friend's room where all the guys are and invites all of them into the bathroom to have a good look at you. He captures their disgusted and delighted faces at the sight of the silly feces that was once his friend. He addresses you one last time "Thanks for the memories, friend, but it's time to say goodbye!"

FLUSH!

Nina just looks at you. "Good-Bye? That's it? No begging or squirming or prise? Man, you ARE weird!"

You sigh soime. "What do you expect? No matter what I say at this point I am either chomped or flushed or both, so why bother?" You sit down on her hand. "Can we just get this over with please, before I change my mind about all this?"

You shiver at the thought, thinking of how your tiny little body will soon be providing nourishment to Nina's much bigger, more powerful body... You make a soft moan, quietly wondering why this excites you so much, why, you are actually eager to end up as a mere snack for a growing girl like Nina....
Finally, Mike's mom is upstairs, and she goes over to Nina's room, peeking her head in, smiling as she sees her daughter sitting on the floor of her room, playing with her dolls. You can see her walking a Barbie doll up to a Ken doll, and saying things for them as she enjoys her game. You notice a small plate set off to one side, with nothing but a few cookie crumbs left on it. You shiver, realizing that Nina has already had a small snack, and is digesting those cookies as she is playing her game... Mike's mom smiles as she steps into the room, "Nina? It looks like you're having a very fun time there.... I have a new present for you, ^^ I am very sure you'll like it.... He asked me specifically to be given to you. He said he wanted to be eaten by you, isn't that so sweet? He thinks you're a sweet, and pretty enough girl, that he wants to be your snack!" Mike's mom giggles, and beams down at her daughter, holding out her hand, letting you sit on her palm. "Here you go sweetie, he's all yours now.... Now, I do want you to eat this little guy soon, alright? He can't stay alive for long. However, you can play with him a little while if you want, ok? Just remember, he has to wind up in your tummy soon..." She smiles, and slides you off her hand and into Nina's, before turning, to carelessly walk out of the room, leaving you alone with Nina.
Nina blinks as she sits there, looking after her mom, then she looks down at you. She is a lot bigger then you are, even for a young girl, she looms over you quite a bit. Slowly, a big smile spreads across her face, and you shiver, realizing she's really glad to have you in her clutches.... And, really really glad, that you are eagerly giving yourself, all to her!

You swallow, knowing there's only two ways this can go now.... The question is, will she simply want to scarf you up right now? Or, will she want to start a new game with you and her dolls, and play a little while more?

They'll never even know you were there, and you will get the fate that you want so very badly..." She chuckles to herself. Then she goes over to the stove, and carelessly drops you into the sink.
You eeeek, as you slide along the cold porcelain. You come to a halt near the garbage disposal. You shiver as you think of what might have happened if you hadn't been able to stop. Overhead, you can hear Mike's mom giggle evilly, "careful there.... wouldn't want to get to the sewers before you're all nicely digested, would you?"
She smirks, as she clangs a pot down overhead, and starts to fill it. It seems to take forever, as torrents of water cascade from the faucet. Then, she finally shuts it off. She smirks at you, as she takes it off, and sets it on the stove. She ignores you completely as she cooks up food for her ravenous children's meal.
As she is doing that, you start to desperately, but carefully, try to get out of this cold sink. You keep trying to scale the sides, but find that they are far too slippery to be able to get up. After a while, you simply get up, and sigh as you lean into one of the corners of the sink, relaxing, and waiting for her to finish cooking.
After a while more, you look up as you hear her approaching. Then you cry out in fear, as you see her holding a strainer overhead, and start to pour the scalding hot contents of the pot into it. All you can do is try to crawl away, as you watch a torrent of scalding hot water go right through the strainer, and splash around the sink.
Luckilly, none of it lands on you, and you watch as she bobs the strainer up and down, getting all the water out. She smirks at you, "heh heh, oh dear, I almost got you there didn't I? well, don't worry sweety, it's not as hot anymore..." She smirks, as she reaches down, and plucks you up. She sighs, as she carelessly drops you into the strainer full of macaroni noodles. Then, before you can get your bearings, she suddenly turns the strainer over, and carelessly dumps you out into her pot. She giggles, as she takes it over, and sets the pot down on one of the unheated burners. She sighs, as she puts in some butter, and milk. about this time, you gasp, as you come up to the surface of the noodles. You look upwards, and cry out, as she dumps a large packet of powdered cheese all over you and the noodles. Then you grunt, as she starts to vigorously stir, stirring the cheese into you and the noodles.

After a while more, everything has calmed down in the pot, though your naked body is covered in cheese sauce. You groan, as you wipe it out of your eyes and off your face. You cough a little, then gasp, as Mike's mom calls out, "KIDS! FOOD!" She giggles, as she turns the pot over, and starts pouring out the noodles in equal quantities into three bowls. She sets them out, and mmms, as she steps back, and eagerly watches to see what's going to happen, wondering who is going to get you...

She beams at you, and sighs, as she leans back, and casually sits back on the toilet, towering over you. She smirks down at you, and reaches down, plucking up the bowl, and setting it on her lap. You look up at her. Before you can say anything, she takes you out and tosses you in the sink again. "Get cleaned off while you think." She orders, a mean look on her face.

Great, you made her mad. Just great considering she could just squash you flat without a word of hesitation. Yet she seems to want to see you eaten up, and now you want to be to. It has brought out hidden desires in you that you never knew. But how to get into their...

You look to her. "What is it?"

She looks right at you....
1352221211.title: Plan S for Sandwich

choices: She takes too big a bite...
13522212112.content:
The mother's tongue licks her giant lips and the thought of it. You uneasily back away from the towering menace, although at your size merely inching away from the fleshy, gurgling stomach puffing through a web of fabric over the counter is a measly distance.

"Relax." she says, anticipating your thoughts. "This is a simple taste test. I have to make sure the type of sandwich I make covers up your taste." She leans down to take some items out of the cupboard below her. The entire counter trembles with the clatter from within.

"Right." you realize, "the girls might taste me if we don't use something the cover me up."

"Let's try something simple." the mother states. It's become absurd that the two of you are thoughtfully discussing your demise like two civilized people talking business. You stumble back as a massive plate slams onto the yellow counter, it's hollow rattling sending shivers down your bones, followed by a tremendous loaf of bread that collapses next to it and lands flat in a doughy hunk.

Bit by bit, you watch the machinations of your devouring play out. The mother's large hands lay out a huge, thick slab of bread, littering crumbs everywhere. Her hand then takes a big knife and carefully dunks it into a giant jug of peanut butter, scraping it loudly against the sides. You look on with morbid awareness as the knife noisily slathers the brown paste all over the white bread. The mother's stomach groans louder as the smell wafts up her giant nostrils and the scraping of peanut butter becomes more sickening and squishy.

You don't know about this. What is she miscalculates? What if she can't help herself and swallows you whole? The fear is creepinh up in your gut and you start to dart your eyes around for an escape, but your terror hold you numb; you know it's useless. You're instead forced to keep watching while the mother starts patting down globs of peanut butter on a new slice of bread...

At last, both slices are sagging from the weight of blankets of peanut butter, oozing and dripping it all around the edges and onto the plate. The mother's dagger-like fingernails wiggle into view and you cower in fear. "Time for your taste test, little boy." she smirks as she plucks you up. The nest thing you know your are hurtling toward the sea of orange, and--!

*SPLOOSH* The gross sensation of plummeting into the thick sticky vat of peanut butter was something you are not prepared for, and it is startling. The gooey paste is difficult to inhale without feeling woozy and is squishing loudly all around you as you flail about. The last thing you see is the fluffy white ceiling of the second slice going dark as it closes down on you like an elevator door, and the mom's thick, wormy lips curling into a smile between the crack of light in the bread pieces before they shut for good.

"Hey, careful--!!"--*SQUISH* You voice is silenced as soon as it pipes up.

Your ears and nose and instantly plugged up from the sudden overflow of peanut butter, and you feel the soggy slabs of breads gently buckle beneath it's own gooey weight as the mother's fingers wriggle underneath one by one and carefully lift it off the plate. Crumbs rain down from the base of the breads as her fingers knead the underside and clamp tight around it. She wets her lips and slowly peels them open for a bite. Hot breath hisses out her open maw while saliva drips steadily down the shimmering walls of her cheeks. The bread enters her mouth and she is salivating even before she has bit down. Her teeth push into the cushion of bread--

At long last, after what seemed to be some hesitation, you emerge from her mouth, dripping wet. You can see by the look in her eyes that what she has to say is good news. You shiver a little, oddly excited. If being eaten is going to be like what it was just now, you can't wait!

135222121121.title: Tasted.

1352221211211.content:
Once again, you watch every step as the mother lays out the pillowy white bread, takes her knife, digs through the titanic jar of peanut butter, slathers it on, and repeats the process.

The stages of your preperation for devouring are the same, but this time around they carry a sense of morbid anticipation. After being licked and fondled by the thick, muscular tongue of an older woman's giant mouth, you're practically bursting at the thought of what being swallowed by a young, nubile mouth is like. You can almost see the stands of saliva hanging from the roof of Nina's mouth as her pink lips and baby teeth open and eagerly wolf you down. Or maybe it will be Stacy? You imagine hers wouldn't be all that different from Nina's just bigger and thinner-lipped. Maybe her tongue will be bigger? It's getting you anxious just thinking about.

The mother's slices of bread lie side by side on the plate and equally drowned in peanut butter. She licked the dried remains of the last gooey sandwich from the corner of her mouth and sighs.

"It's time." she tells you.

You gulp and nod. The spider-like shadow of her long, dangling fingers covers you and you cower instinctively as if to run, but you hold yourself numb. Her silky-smooth thumb and forefinger cup you and lift you over to the sea of mushy brown that will soon be your grave. She gently places you in the center of the left slice, and with her other hand, slowly tips the second slice on it's side and starts to tilt it toward your tiny body. Your knees bog down in the suffocating swamp of peanut butter and you weakly hold your hands up as the walls of gooey sludge tumbles at you...

The mother's fingers gently kneads the top of the bread as peanut butter spurts out the edges and drips freely onto the plate.

"A vulgar way to die." she tells herself. "But, it must be done."

She slides it daintily to the center and picks up the plate to take it to your final resting place. As her giant feet make their slow, delibrate journey through the room, her mouth waters from the plate being carried beneath her chin. Biting her lip in restraint, she decides where the best place to lay you would be and places you somewhere where you're most likely to be found and where her children would be unable to resist...
1352221211211.title: It's time for your devouring

13522212112111.content:
The mother carries the sandwich (and you) up the stairs to the door at the very top. When her feet reach the platform, the floor creaks beneath her and she sees the shadows of her daughters through the crack in the doorway, moving. She bends over and sets the plate just outside the door. The base of the plate clanks and echoes on the hard floor.

With the trap set, she looks past her chest down at the fat, tasty sandwich beside her feet, and after giving it a rueful look, turns to go back down the stairs. It's only a matter of time before one of her gluttony girls finds it.

After hearing the mother's footsteps stomping into the distance, the lack of air gets to you and you somehow wriggle through the slimy mess to the edge of the break and peer out. The gigantic crack in the doorway glows faintly out in front of you. You start to play with the thought of making a break for it. After all, it's the sensible thing to do. Despite you disappointment at not getting to be devoured by the mouth of a giant girl...

Suddenly the door snaps open with a creak and swings wide. You quickly cower back beneath the cover of the soggy bread piece and see two giant bare feet step out into the hall just a centimeter from the plate.

The door closes shut behind them and for a moment you're scared that whoever it is will accidently step on the sandwich and squish you beneath her sole and the soggy bread. But then you see the toes gently flex on the hardwood from the surprise of seeing the sandwich there. Hidden beneath the heavy bread, you shiver at the sight of the huge toes grasping out at air. Just think how they could grab you and grind you betwen them, it's terrifying.

Just then the wood starts to buckle beneath the balls of both feet. The fleshy creases on the little ankles deepen as the girl leans down wraps her hands around the gleaming edges of the plate.

"Mmmm, this smells tasty. I'm going to keep this for myself." a giant voice hisses. It's...

She smiles. The natural place for a sandwich is on the table, so she takes you into the kicthen, setting you dead center on it. She looks down at it and chuckles.

"Farewell little boy." She says. "I do hope you enjoy your fate. I'd stay and watch just to make sure, but I have a busy day yet." You then hear her footsteps fade away as she heads off. You seem to wait for several minutes. THen what seems to be a half hour passes. NOTHING. WHere is everyone?

You then decide to stick your head out of the sandwich, and what you see makes you smile. There is hope for you to live yet!

The table is littered with debris from the kids and a mother who has been very busy this morning. Even the peanut butter from this morning is still out. You chuckle a little and ponder what to do.

On one hand, you did say yu would be food for one of the kids. You swore to it. Moreover, the experience was one better than anything you have ever felt in your whole life! It's a great way to go, rather than get old and die of disease or something. You're giving yourself to someone.

On the other hand, LIVING is still a very nice option. And you want to get unshrunk somehow, that ray gun HAS to be in this house somewhere. But if the other sees you from here on out, it is likely she will juyst flush you.

Either way, the odds are not in your favor. So what do you do?

info.brief_description: story where anything and everything is possible when you're shrunken
info.description:
This is to replace an old Interactive story that was lost long ago. I can't remember all of the story, so anyone who remembers the original Oh-No, please add what you want or can. ^^ and of course, anyone can add whatever they desire, very little will be cut from this story.

But basically what happens is that you wake up one morning shrunk, and have to try and find someone to help you unshrink, in a house full of lots of people, and dragons, who have all kinds of fun ideas what to do with you, lots of them involving their toilets, or their bellies... will you ever get back to normal, alive?

Small Note Please make your additions as detailed as possible. I will cut chapters that are too short, that aren't descriptive, that don't match the story line, or are just generally confusing. However, I will make every attempt to make edits to your chapters to minimize the number of chapters I delete.

Second Note Due to changes in interactive story options, chapters 3-4 now have 3 options instead of the 2 like it used to be. So I have gone through, and where possible, I added a third option to most of the chapter 3 and 4 additions. So please go back to those, and see if perhaps you would like to take one of these newly added routes to the story.

Side Note Personally, I don't have very much interest in boobs or vaginas or pussies or anything like that. I don't mind if you add them, though I would ask that you have a point in adding them; please don't add boob stuff just for the sake of having boob stuff. It is almost certain I won't delete any additions of this sort, though I feel that this is first and foremost a shrinking VORE story.
